snippet.title: First Break - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
First Break is a puzzle/bullet-hell game about escaping a strange prison full of traps.

Play it in your browser on Itch: https://rcab.itch.io/first-break-demo
or on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3217690

If you’d like to support the game, don’t forget to wishlist it on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2885890/First_Break/
